data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Moradabad, Uttar Pradesh, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Moradabad, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Moradabad, Uttar Pradesh, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Moradabad, Uttar Pradesh, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Moradabad prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Brahmin Sanadhya people.
Father, bring yourself glory in Moradabad. Through your servants plant 954 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Moradabad to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Moradabad who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

location.name: Moradabad
location.people_groups_list: Rajput Agnivansi, Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions), Brahmin Rikhisur, Jat Dalal (Muslim traditions), Gadaria (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rajput Agnivansi (202,000), Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions) (1,100), Brahmin Rikhisur (52,000), Jat Dalal (Muslim traditions) (400), Gadaria (Muslim traditions) (3,800)
